Learn "hands-on" PLS path modeling using the newest SmartPLS Professional version software taught by an expert. Live, online, 2-day webinar featuring SmartPLS 3.1.9 Pro. 2,500 SmartPLS citations in academic journals over past decade. Participants receive: a certificate; a 30-day SmartPLS 3.1.9 professional license; a PLS-GUI SaaS license active thru 2015; all demonstrated files, data, models and projects, and slides; and complete HD audio and video recordings of the completed webinar. Modelling Economic [...] Sue Nugus 2015-02-06T14:45:26+00:00 2015-02-06T14:45:26+00:00 A Free Research Dictionary https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BUSINESS-RESEARCH;1adeed45.1502 We would like more researcher students to have a copy of the Dictionary of Research Terms. Therefore we are offering the e-Pub version of this dictionary to research students free of charge. This is in e-Pub format and will run on a wide range of devices from tablets to laptops to desk top computers. It has been developed to work with http://calibre-ebook.com/ which may be easily downloaded for free. Details of this e-Book may be reviewed at http://www.academic-bookshop.com/ourshop/prod_3614945-Dictionary-of-Research-Concepts-and-Issues-ePUB-version-ISBN-9781910309537.html If any of your students would like an e-copy of this book please advise them to complete the form and submit it [...] Sue Nugus 2015-02-05T12:40:47+00:00 2015-02-05T12:40:47+00:00 10th European Conference on Innovation and Entrepreneurship - ECIE 2015 - Second Call for Submissions https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BUSINESS-RESEARCH;76eee26d.1502 Hello<br><br>This is a second call for papers for the 10th European Conference on Innovation and Entrepreneurship - ECIE 2015 being held at the University of Genoa, Italy on the 17-18 September 2015.<br>This call will close on 25th of February 2015.<br>The conference provides an international opportunity for scientific discussion and collaboration on a broad range of relevant areas associated with recent trends in innovation and entrepreneurship. In past years, there is a growing recognition in the business environment of the key role played by innovation and entrepreneurship. [...] Geoffrey Hubona 2015-02-04T05:39:45-07:00 2015-02-04T05:39:45-07:00 Earn 3 quantitative PhD graduate credits online this summer https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BUSINESS-RESEARCH;3b1b766e.1502 Earn 3 graduate credits online this summer applicable to many Master's and PhD programs in Europe and elsewhere. The course presents a comprehensive overview of the most advanced statistical, multivariate, SEM and Path Modeling techniques used today in research data analyses. Successful participants receive a 3-graduate-credit certificate issued by the Hamburg University of Technology (TUHH), a premier University in the EUC. Referrals to non-listserv interested parties are welcomed. Very early registrants have access to a very limited number of spaces that are offered to anyone (students, faculty, or practitioners) for $595 USD total with a deposit of $150. Demographic shift in the form<br>of \ufffd\ufffd\ufffdageing societies\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd has become recognised among academics and<br>policy-makers as a growing economic challenge to organisations globally and<br>to those operating from within so-called \ufffd\ufffd\ufffddeveloped\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd economies in<br> [...]
